Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Activity of Snake B-Defensins and Derived Peptides
Literature.Author: Oguiura N, Corrêa PG, Rosmino IL, de Souza AO, Pasqualoto KFM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>500µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=125µM),Micrococcus luteus A270(MIC=31.5µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>500µM),Citrobacter freundii(MIC=>500µM),Providencia rettgeri(no activity data),Serratia marcescens(no activity data),Morganella morganii(no activity data),Candida albicans IOC 4525(MIC90=>250µM),Cryptococcus neoformans IOC 4528(MIC90=>250µM),Trichophyton rubrum IOC 4527(MIC90=>250µM),Aspergillus fumigatus IOC 4526(MIC90=>250µM)
